metas.description: The full JCB Triumph Hurdle Race Card will be available here and will include the odds and form lines for each runner.

page.content:
JCB Triumph Hurdle Race Card 2012

The Triumph Hurdle is the first race on the final day of the Cheltenham Festival and this year in particular it looks like a top class renewal with a number of top class runners set to take their chance. The full race card will of course be available and it will include all the betting and form for each of the runners in the field, while the details on the connections and jockeys will also be on offer for punters.

Triumph Hurdle Race Card 2013
